Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience and provide exceptional value. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $150. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it for $180. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and exclusivity this product offers. I trust you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
